translations: n.殖民者（colonist 的复数）；殖民地居民

phrs.translation: 契丹殖民者, 正在翻译
殖民者迅速采取行动, 殖民者移动快速, 殖民移动快速地, 殖民者快速移动
日本殖民统治, 翻译公司殖民者

sentences.sentence: The apple was brought over here by the colonists when they came.
sentences.translation: 这苹果是殖民者到这儿时带来的。

sentences.sentence: Many colonists were able to adopt a lifestyle similar to that of middle-class Britons.
sentences.translation: 许多殖民者能够接受一种类似于英国中产阶级的生活方式。

sentences.sentence: After all, the colonists had just come from Europe and the medieval period was just ended.
sentences.translation: 毕竟，殖民者刚从欧洲过来，而且中世纪才刚刚结束。
